item.title: About Hugo
item.description: This website is made using Hugo, a static site generator. It is hosted on gh-pages. Future-imperfect is ported by Julio Pescador with some extra goodies. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan.
